question:
Which of the following is true about MIKE program?
  1. It is against the illegal killing of elephants
  2. All the South Asian countries are part of this program
Select the correct answer from the codes given below:
explanation:
MIKE stands for Monitoring the Illegal Killing of Elephants and was started in the South Asian Region in 2003. the program is under CITES (the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora). Countries involved in the project are
South Asia – Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Nepal and Sri Lanka
Southeast Asia – Cambodia, China, Indonesia, Lao PDR, Malaysia, Myanmar, Thailand and Viet Nam
